psi0_current_limit.description: The limit of current we let the motherboard deliver to the PSI0.
psi0_current_limit.label: PSI0 Current Limit (mA)

stapm_time_ms.description: Skin Temperature Aware Power Management. This will define the boost period to be used.
stapm_time_ms.label: STAPM Constant Time (Sec.)

stapm_limit_w.description: Skin Temperature Aware Power Management. This will define the socket power package limit which is used to manage the device boost period.
stapm_limit_w.label: STAPM Limit (W)

ppt_fast_limit_w.description: The amount of power the CPU can draw while boost levels on.
ppt_fast_limit_w.label: PPT Fast Limit (W)

ppt_slow_limit_w.description: The amount of power the CPU can draw while boost levels off.
ppt_slow_limit_w.label: PPT Slow Limit (W)

temperature_limit_c.description: The temperature the CPU can reach before boost levels off.
temperature_limit_c.label: Temperature Limit (Â°C)

vrm_current_m_a.description: The limit of current we let the motherboard deliver to the CPU.
vrm_current_m_a.label: VRM Current (A)

max_fclk_frequency.description: Fabric is AMD's marketing term for the bus connection that connects processor dies (GPU/CPU). This define the bus's max. clock limit.
max_fclk_frequency.label: Maximum transmission frequency (Mhz)

min_fclk_frequency.description: Fabric is AMD's marketing term for the bus connection that connects processor dies (GPU/CPU). This define the bus's min. clock limit.
min_fclk_frequency.label: Minimum transmission frequency (Mhz)

max_gfxclk_frequency.description: The maximum clock speed the integrated GPU is allowed to run at.
max_gfxclk_frequency.label: Maximum GFX Clock Frequency (Mhz)

min_gfxclk_frequency.description: The minimum clock speed the integrated GPU is allowed to run at.
min_gfxclk_frequency.label: Minimum GFX Clock Frequency (Mhz)

max_socclk_frequency.description: The maximum clock speed the CPU is allowed to run at.
max_socclk_frequency.label: Maximum SOC Clock Frequency (Mhz)

min_socclk_frequency.description: The minimum clock speed the CPU is allowed to run at.
min_socclk_frequency.label: Minimum SOC Clock Frequency (Mhz)
